titlestmt.titleproper: John Frederick Lewis collection of cuneiform tablets undated

did.unittitle: John Frederick Lewis collection of cuneiform tablets
did.repository: Free Library of Philadelphia, Rare Book Department

scopecontent.p: Over 2800 clay tablets from 2800 B.C. to 700 B.C.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

relatedmaterial.p: Related material may be found in the following collections: University of Delaware: John Frederick Lewis papers.
